title: cant recieve skins through crafting
body:
been getting this error for 3 days now , i have 3 permanent skins not one is activating tryied for 3 days in a row to ''unlock  permanently '' and keep getting this error
http://imgur.com/a/DsysI

replies.body: it was bugged for 3 skins but a week later they got added so no worries sorted it self out , sorry for not replying  not on boards much

Which skin was this for?  I believe this might be just a display issue, but the content is still getting added.  You can double check by reviewing your collections despite that error message.  Let me know!
